title: Mamma mia! INCREDIBLE HYPNOTIC "BRIDGE" | Non-Verbal SPORT Hypnosis
description:
"Mamma mia" - this is what the subject in our video exclaims after achieving an astonishing level of flexibility by doing - for the first time ever - the Backwards Bridge. This shows that with Dr. Marco Paret's unique techniques, anyone, at any age and physical condition can obtain those very same results.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
